item.title: Clarisse add a quote by Ezra Taft Benson
item.description: "A good name is still to be preferred over great riches. Especially it is to be preferred to the appearance of riches, aquired with nothing down and nothing to pay for 2 months." -- Ezra Taft Benson

item.title: Clarisse add a quote by Dave Ramsey
item.description: "You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you." -- Dave Ramsey

item.title: Clarisse add a quote by Howard W. Hunter
item.description: "Motherhood is near to divinity. It is the highest, holiest service to be assumed by mankind." -- Howard W. Hunter

item.title: Clarisse add a quote by Don Herold
item.description: "Babies are such a nice way to start people." -- Don Herold

item.title: Clarisse add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Clarisse add a quote by Spencer W. Kimball
item.description: "I ask you, what good is a big picture window and the lavish appointments and a priceless decor in a home if there is no mother there?" -- Spencer W. Kimball
